channel.title: HKG:2669 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: China’s Inaction Deepens Peril for Struggling Property Stocks
item.description: Investors are growing skeptical that Chinese developer stocks will stage a rebound this year, as Beijing’s reluctance to unleash sweeping stimulus deepens pessimism about the sector.
